title: FS: T206-ED KILLIAN -SGC 40 VG 3!!--NILES SOLD-- Both SGC

posts.post_title: FS: T206-ED KILLIAN -SGC 40 VG 3!!--NILES SOLD-- Both SGC
posts.post_content:
11-22: NILES SOLD


2 more selections from the Roy Mellinger Collection, which is dwindling down to the last 12 cards or so!

N54 thread re: [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthr...highlight=t206[/url]

(1) T206 ED KILLIAN PITCHING-TIGERS P150/25 SGC 40 VG 3! 

This is an EQUISITE EXAMPLE of ED KILLIAN, pitcher for the DETROIT TIGERS. EYE APPEAL is WAY ABOVE grade given, for sure! LARGE SNOW WHITE BORDERS & NICE SHARP CORNERS are very obvious, along w/ a BEAUTIFULLY COLORFUL picture in FULL, CLEAR FOCUS. the back is SUPER CLEAN--AN OVERALL SUPERIOR T206! $59 DELIVERED!

(2) T206 HARRY NILES-RED SOX P150/25 SGC 30 GOOD 2! 

This is a BRILLIANT EXAMPLE of HARRY NILES, infielder-outfielder for the BOSTON RED SOX. This SUPER CLEAN card is VERY WELL CENTERED w/ SNOW WHITE BORDERS F & B. PERFECT COLOR & CONTRAST w/ IN-FOCUS PIC. A CRISP, FRESH T206 for YOUR FINE COLLECTION! This card is as SWEET as can be for the grade given! $39 DELIVERED!


PM/EM me if interested in 1 or both! I will take all mail in order by time-stamp.

Thanks for looking--These are 2 GORGEOUS, Well Preserved T206's w/ a COOL Minor League provenance.
These 2 BEAUTIES need a new owner!
These 2 are still available & they are anxious to go to a new home!
